verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, come let’s sing, Let us rejoice! Oh, come let’s sing, Let us rejoice!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Messiah’s come, and He brought life, And He put laughter in my soul.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It would have been enough if He’d brought peace… It would have been enough if He’d brought love… It would have been enough if He’d brought life… But He put laughter in my soul.{/lang-eng}
